title: New witnesses to shake up second Cosby sex assault trial
text:
New witnesses to shake up second Cosby sex assault trial 10:38am EDT - 01:31 
The judge has allowed new witnesses for both the defense and prosecution in Bill Cosby's second sex assault trial. The re-trial is set to begin Monday, after the first ended in a hung jury last year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The judge has allowed new witnesses for both the defense and prosecution in Bill Cosby's second sex assault trial. The re-trial is set to begin Monday, after the first ended in a hung jury last year.
